author: matkt0
content: I'm still spamming the network with random tip and feecap but the txpool of geth is empty (the list of transaction i'm sending http://18.224.51.102:3000/block/2670) am I missing something ? with legacy transaction the pool of Geth is fine

author: karalabe
content: I've seen something funky on Calaveras. Been spamming with tiny txs

author: karalabe
content: Geth is able to fill an entire block (currently about 1200 txs)

author: karalabe
content: however, the other signer currently live stops at about 16M gas (~750 tx)

author: karalabe
content: E.g. after submitting 3000 txs, first block was by geth

author: karalabe
content: `INFO [06-01|18:22:54.969] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1 txs=1201 mgas=25.221 elapsed=47.414ms    mgasps=531.923 number=2906 hash=d9688a..7bc52d dirty=20.81KiB`

author: karalabe
content: Then this `0xa7` signer: `INFO [06-01|18:23:25.483] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1 txs=784  mgas=16.464 elapsed=32.459ms    mgasps=507.211 number=2907 hash=4aa922..a416ff dirty=23.61KiB`

author: karalabe
content: Then Geth again `INFO [06-01|18:23:54.910] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1 txs=1015 mgas=21.315 elapsed=36.424ms    mgasps=585.191 number=2908 hash=b61b6b..8add08 dirty=26.15KiB`

author: karalabe
content: You can see that the second signer stopped filling at 16M block, leaving 9M gas empty space

author: karalabe
content: Perhaps another client's tx pool cannot accomodate so many txs?

author: timbeiko
content: Is it possible this is related to <@!680337202521440470>'s issue above, <@!206016661470314496> ? It seems like in both cases transactions sent from client A aren't processed quite right by the mempool of client B.

author: matkt0
content: We have some issues when we are producing new block. So for now we are not producing new block. we will try to fix that asap. So the other signer it's not Besu

author: matkt0
content: it is also the feeling that I have. We have clients with multiple transactions in the pool but empty blocks while others make full blocks
